text:
Hey there module attributes are documented on our using modules in templates page
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/using-modules-in-templates#block-syntax>

They are purely an alternate way of setting template level default values to fields in your module.

It is honestly easier to just pass the JSON itself to the module parameter than to use this format. The one use-case module_attribute is really useful for is when you’re dealing with HTML. That’s what our example shows
